author: ralexstokes
content:
Reposting action items from that post:

**Action Items**
* Merge https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/599 ASAP
* Finalize update to EIP-7691: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/9060
* Merge https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/4020 ASAP for devnet-5
* Check this post for some ACD process improvement suggestions for next week: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/allcoredevs-network-upgrade-ethmagicians-process-improvements/20157/51
